# NCHU NLP API

All-in-one API service, serving multiple NLP tasks for system demo at NCHU NLP Lab.

## Services

### Question Generation

| Model                      | Language            | Author                                                                                                                   | Paper                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| p208p2002/bart-squad-qg-hl | English             | Harry Chan ([@Harry-Chan](https://github.com/Harry-Chan))<br />Philip Huang ([@p208p2002](https://github.com/p208p2002)) | [![EMNLP 2019](https://img.shields.io/badge/EMNLP-2019-red?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://aclanthology.org/D19-5821/)[^1] |
| p208p2002/gpt2-drcd-qg-hl  | Traditional Chinese | Harry Chan ([@Harry-Chan](https://github.com/Harry-Chan))<br />Philip Huang ([@p208p2002](https://github.com/p208p2002)) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

### Distractor Generation

| Model                              | Language | Author                                            | Paper                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ---------------------------------- | -------- | ------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| voidful/bart-distractor-generation | English  | Eric Lam ([@voidful](https://github.com/voidful)) | [![EMNLP 2020](https://img.shields.io/badge/EMNLP-2020-red?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://aclanthology.org/2020.findings-emnlp.393/)[^2] |

### Misc

- Context-Question-Answer pair exporting

## Development

### Setup

Run this on first time

- Clone Repository

```shell
git clone https://github.com/NCHU-NLP-Lab/API.git
cd API
```

- Install Dependencies

```shell
pip install -r requirements.txt
# or use poetry
poetry install
```

### Launch

```shell
uvicorn server:app --reload
```

[^1]: [A Recurrent BERT-based Model for Question Generation](https://aclanthology.org/D19-5821/)
[^2]: [A BERT-based Distractor Generation Scheme with Multi-tasking and Negative Answer Training Strategies.](https://aclanthology.org/2020.findings-emnlp.393/)
